summary: A startling motive is revealed when psychotic killer Melvin 'Spider' Holiday stalks 8 unsuspecting teenage victims lured to an abandoned amusement park off old Route 66.
cast: Michael Copon|Rachel Lara|Julia Beth Stern|Alex Mandel|Kaley Victoria Rose|Matt Calloway|David Namminga|Noah Gibbings|Gabriel Olivera|Richard Hoag|Sydney Rae Shalhoob|Randolph Mantooth|Puffy Copon|Fuse|Brian Harwell|Kristina Kane|Iam Kevin|Jon Koons|Brett Lazar|Terry T. Miller|Luke Neal|Oko No-No|Victoria J. Ramos|Jenna Scanlon|Melissa Sharp|Steve Shepard|Olivia Shove|Argyle Sox|Bruce Spears|Chad Taylor|Marty Thomas|Sunni Thomas|Triproy|Tezozomoc Vasquez|Jennifer Vogel|Jon Zuber
title: Killer Holiday
